channel.title: Question on commands and menus?
channel.description: Ok i what to know how to make a command that can make a mnu pop up. but first how do i make a ew menu like a commad list menu? Second how i make acommand that will let th command list menu pop up?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 11:35:13 AM[/size][hr]please anyone?

item.title: Question on commands and menus?

item.description:
@o01pku wrote:

to add the public void just go to client.java press ctrl + f search for public void and under the last } press enter and add it

item.title: Question on commands and menus?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Make a new void similar to this, just edit the * symbols to what you want the menu to say.

public void MainHelp() { sendFrame126("@dre@Main Helpmenu", 8144); //Helpmenu title clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("@whi@Welcome back "+playerName, 8146); sendFrame126("@dbl@WebClient : ***********", 8147); sendFrame126("@dbl@Forum : ***********, 8148); sendFrame126("@dbl@Server owner is:", 8150); sendFrame126("@dre@***********", 8151); sendFrame126("@dre@***********", 8153); sendFrame126("***********", 8154); sendFrame126("***********", 8155); sendFrame126("***********", 8156); sendFrame126("***********", 8158); sendFrame126("***********", 8159); sendFrame126("***********", 8160); sendFrame126("***********", 8161); sendFrame126("@dbl@@dre@***********", 8163); sendFrame126("@dbl@Owner:***********", 8164); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }

Then put this command with all your other commands:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mainhelp")) { MainHelp(); }

Read full topic
